sampleRequest.request: What are the latest developments in AI?

sampleResponse.response: Recent developments in AI include advances in large language models, multimodal AI systems, and improved efficiency in model training. Key areas include prompt engineering, fine-tuning techniques, and real-world applications across various industries.
